text_elements.typography_notes: The cursive font is elegant but may affect readability at smaller sizes.

symbol.description: A coffee cup with vertical lines resembling sound waves

color_palette.contrast_notes: The gold on dark gray provides good contrast.

layout.balance_notes: The logo is well-balanced with equal emphasis on text and symbol.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate white space around elements enhances readability.

issues.description: Cursive font may be hard to read at small sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a more legible font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: The logo aligns with current trends in minimalistic and elegant design.
